en-EN.article: Iâ€™m GÃ¶kcan. Iâ€™m a Web Developer who builds end-to-end web applications using modern Front-End and Back-End technologies. I create user-focused interfaces with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, and develop robust, scalable back-end solutions with Node.js and SQL.
en-EN.communication: You can contact me through my profiles above

info.name: Education
info.value: EskiÅŸehir Technical University, Mechanical Engineering (%30 English), Bachelor's, 2022

info.name: Preferred Roles
info.value: Front-End Developer, Junior Full Stack Developer

en-EN.about: After gaining experience in various areas of mechanical engineering, I reshaped my career around computer, design, and web technologiesâ€”fields I have been interested in since childhood. Working with user interfaces, seeing instant results, and having the freedom to create creative solutions led me to focus on Front-End development; building on this foundation, I also started actively working on the back-end to deliver end-to-end solutions and strengthen my full-stack skill set. I develop user-focused, high-performance, and scalable interfaces using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, and build robust back-end solutions with Node.js and SQL, continuing my journey as a Web Developer through hands-on projects and a strong focus on continuous growth.
en-EN.about2: During my university years, I served as the Design Department Director in the EskiÅŸehir Technical University Career and Entrepreneurship Student Community, creating designs (posters, banners, videos) and event content. I also participated in social responsibility projects by introducing Turkish language and culture to international volunteers at AIESEC Turkey. Additionally, I developed content creation and organizational skills at the Social Media Student Community. My social activities include cooking, watching documentaries, practicing martial arts, and organizing trips outside the city.

projects.name: Medical E-Commerce Site
projects.description: I worked on an e-commerce site built with Next.js, implementing front-end adjustments and new features according to the client's design. I resolved issues in the payment flow, enabling PayTR integration and shipping integration (Geliver), and fixed calculation and flow problems in the customer points system. I also performed front-end adjustments in the Laravel-built admin panel and completed missing/incorrect API data in the backend to strengthen the front-end integration.

projects.name: Luxury Yacht Manufacturer â€“ Corporate Website
projects.description: I delivered a pixel-perfect Figma implementation for a luxury yacht manufacturerâ€™s corporate website. I improved performance and technical SEO based on PageSpeed Insights and Lighthouse audits, and made updates to Laravel Blade views and routing.

projects.name: Shopify Kitchen Products Project (In Progress)
projects.description: I made theme and content adjustments on a Shopify store, edited Liquid code, added products and collections. I also handled translations.

projects.name: Antakya Cuisine Restaurant Website
projects.description: A Bootstrap theme was customized to redesign the layout and add extra features. Dynamic translation into 8 languages was implemented using i18n.

projects.name: Defense Industry Company Website (In Progress)
projects.description: A defense industry company website developed pixel-perfect according to the Figma design using HTML, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, and made dynamic with Laravel. I also developed a dynamic product configuration page using jQuery.

projects.name: Freelance Platform for Translators (Cancelled)
projects.description: A freelance platform for translators developed pixel-perfect from Figma design. A website with multiple forms and profile pages where users can update their information was created. Email designs were also implemented.

projects.name: Pizza Order Website
projects.description: Created during my front-end education journey. A dynamic order page created for a pizza company. It is built with React and Axios to handle POST requests. It is a single-page application consisting of 3 components. Form validation checks the input before posting the data.
